landing.heroDescription: Embark on an epic journey through the world of Warcraft. Choose your class, forge legendary items, conquer dungeons, and become the ultimate hero.

spotlight.label: Choose Your Path
spotlight.title: Hero Spotlight
spotlight.paladinDesc: A holy warrior clad in shining armor. The Paladin excels at absorbing damage and protecting allies with divine shields and healing auras.
spotlight.archmageDesc: A master of the arcane arts. The Archmage unleashes devastating spells from afar, controlling the battlefield with frost, fire, and lightning.
spotlight.rangerDesc: A swift and deadly marksman. The Ranger strikes from the shadows with precise arrows and traps, excelling at picking off targets.
spotlight.berserkerDesc: An unstoppable force of rage. The Berserker charges into battle with devastating cleave attacks, growing stronger the longer the fight lasts.

news.label: Latest News
news.title: What's New
news.news1Excerpt: Explore the Frozen Citadel, a challenging new dungeon with unique boss mechanics and legendary loot drops.
news.news2Excerpt: Register now for the annual TWRPG Spring Tournament. Compete for glory, rare items, and the champion title.
news.news3Excerpt: Our comprehensive beginner's guide has been refreshed with new class recommendations and leveling strategies.
